> 1) how to catch errors in junit. what i mean is how to create a log file.


See documentation to catch errors;
use ant to create a log file, or modify the TextUIRunner


> 2) how to check the private methods in java. for example i have a

JUnit cannot test private methods.  Only test public methods (and your 
private methods are certainly called from the public one)


> 3) are their any web testing tools which are free, 


Cactus @ apache.org
